services.title: Private Client Wealth Management
services.description: At High Rock's Private Client division, we manage money for individuals, families, professional and private corporations on a Separately Managed Account (SMA) basis.  This means that it is your account and they are your securities at all times...you just give High Rock discretion to trade in your account.  Your account is held at Raymond James Correspondent Services (the Custodian for holding our securities and providing trade settlements and tax reporting etc) with all the safety of the Canadian Investor Protection Fund (CIPF).
services.info:
At High Rock's Private Client division, we manage money for individuals, families, professional and private corporations on a Separately Managed Account (SMA) basis.  This means that it is your account and they are your securities at all times...you just give High Rock discretion to trade in your account.  Your account is held at Raymond James Correspondent Services (the Custodian for holding our securities and providing trade settlements and tax reporting etc) with all the safety of the Canadian Investor Protection Fund (CIPF).

**We have Private Clients from all across Canada, from Vancouver to Ottawa, many of whom are:**
- Teachers and Retired Teachers
- Dentists/Doctors/Chiropractors and their Professional Corporations
- Chartered Professional Accountants
- Business Owners/Entrepreneurs
- Investment Bankers
- Lawyers
- Private Real Estate Investors
- Real Estate Agents
- CEO's, CFO's and other corporate executives (and retired)
- â€‹Professional Athletes
- Chief Operating Officers of Households 

**Our Mission Statement for our Private Client division is simple.  Managing a family's wealth is about three things and we strive to do all three extremely well:**
- Investment Management - based on deep fundamental research 
- Financial Planning - your Wealth Forecast forms the basis for our investment decisions
- Client Service - communication and an open-door policy, 24/7

**High Rock's Private Client division is unique against other Asset Management firms and Investment Advisors:**
- Interests totally aligned - we manage our own money exactly the same as our client money
- Complete fee transparency - above and beyond the regulatory requirement
- Expertise in capital markets - decades actually managing large-scale risk for a living
- Independent Review Committee - the only Manager* in the country to use one (* We believe we are the only Portfolio Manager, managing money on an SMA basis, to have adopted an IRC)
